data.name: Library of Babel Demo
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5-2300 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 or RadeonÂ® HD4800 series, 512 MB of memory
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800 or Radeon
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

content_descriptors.notes: Library of Babel is not an exceptionally gruesome game but if does feature some violent moments, including investigating murders. All participants are robots.
